## [0.0.6](https://github.com/seveves/ng2-vis/compare/v0.0.5...v0.0.6) (2016-12-13)
* Using @types/vis now
* Updated to webpack2
* Updated to angular 2.4.10
* Fixed build and test configuration
* Fixed problems with AOT compilation #26
